definition[0]: a musical instrument made of skin stretched over a circular frame, played by hitting it with your hand or a stick
example[1]: 1,000 people marched, beating drums and carrying flags.
example[2]: Jones played the drums in an all-girl band.
example[3]: Trumpeter Red Rodney was playing with Kenny Clarke on drums  (=playing the drums).
definition[1]: a large round container for storing liquids such as oil, chemicals etc
definition[2]: something that looks like a drum, especially part of a machine
definition[4]: to make a sound similar to a drum by hitting a surface again and again
example[6]: I could hear the rain drumming against the windows.
example[7]: Lisa drummed her fingers impatiently on the table.
